strings.Value: "How odd. I know much about birds. Seen a lot of them. Never seen one that was sentient."
"If there be men with the minds of pigeons, there must be birds with the minds of men!"
"Magic can do many things. But this raven seems unusual even for a magical creature."
"Is it 'sentient' to insult the local ruler? One might instead say 'foolhardy'."
"What a strange bird this raven is! Who is he? A spirit of these lands? Or someone's messenger? Or perhaps another fey who changed their appearance to play a cruel joke?"
"What a strange bird this raven is! Who is he? A spirit of these lands? Or someone's messenger? Or perhaps another fey who changed their appearance to play a cruel joke?"
